website_summaries.verdict: Priced well, this shampoo is paraben-free and noted to create silky hair with just one use.
pros: This shampoo creates happy customers not only for its price point, but for its ability to transform hair
People of all hair types note this shampoo helps with brushing and easily removing tangles, which can reduce breakage
cons: Formulated for the masses, this shampoo may be a bit to heavy for some hair types

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo for Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair with little body, but the ends get “frizzy”. This product is gentle on my hair, but adds a little body and also tames the ends better than any other shampoo I’ve used (including very expensive brands)! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. McWilliam

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it smells
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it smells, but the ingredients aren't the best. I've used it twice and it makes my scalp itch unbearably so. I usually use Nature's Gate or Giovanni and never have the issues this shampoo presents.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of this product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and surprisingly this has become my go-to and number one shampoo I will not use another shampoo besides this one it's a great product and enjoy every bit of it and it smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: crystal s.

customer_reviews.title: This line of shampoo & conditioner is actually really good. It makes my hair super soft & shiny ...
customer_reviews.text: This line of shampoo & conditioner is actually really good. It makes my hair super soft & shiny but in a natural way. The only thing is that bc it has coconut oil, using too much sometimes makes my hair greasy, even the shampoo. Not too bad tho
customer_reviews.author: cali

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Nothing so much to be said about this shampoo. Smells nice, good foam; did it sooth my hair and eliminate frizzy hair - no. Gets the job done I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo. It smells good, and smooth my hair. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: great smell
customer_reviews.text: loved the smell price was higher than I like to pay
customer_reviews.author: doddie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing broke but the shipping time yike's waited a little too long.
customer_reviews.text: Was sick of buying from Wal-Mart this took too long to arrive otherwise genuine good product.
customer_reviews.author: Noneyuh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the shampoo and conditioner! Still a bit pricey on Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Soft shinny hair
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter hair and I must say I love how her hair feels and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Pena

customer_reviews.title: But smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know it had sulfate in it. But smells amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Aminata L.

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. Just be certain. This is a very small bottle. FYI.
customer_reviews.author: NANCI LENOCI

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and a great price! Would highly recommend this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came recommended and it does work with dealing with curls and frizz
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I love this line
customer_reviews.text: I love this line. I do feel this bottle is MUCH smaller compared to the conditioner. You may need 2. But it is a good line for frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.author: RDA

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite but...
customer_reviews.text: How to review this? It’s a good product. I like Garnier products, I think it smells good, lathers nice, but my hair acts weird afterwards. I’m one of those people who “switch off” to a different product periodically...I find I seldom reach for this one for MY hair, if i can’t give it away, I can always use it to launder my unmentionables. It’s a good product that just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cuddlekat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell.
customer_reviews.text: Prime Pantry Purchase. I love this shampoo. I will be repurchasing. The scent is remarkable, and I find that the oils in it make my hair feel smooth without needing to condition each wash. A plus in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sham----poo!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to control frizz? Made my curls even frizzier. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: dlf73

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo, using it since many years without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wael

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for itchy dandruff relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read that coconut oil will help with itchy dry dandruff scalp. I was trying every type of dandruff shampoo, and my scalp itched even more. This is definitely giving me relief, although I've only used it three times. I'm hoping after a couple weeks it will still deliver...
customer_reviews.author: meggon swarner

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Scent
customer_reviews.text: I received this product complimentary from Crowdtap for review purposes. The review that follows is my own opinion based on my sampling of the product. I really like the way this set left my hair. It was smooth and frizz-less. It also added a great amount of shine to my hair. I will definitely be purchasing this item again in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiLadyLiving

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of this whole blends smoothing shampoo but
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this whole blends smoothing shampoo but, it does not lather very well and you seemed to have to use a lot of it to shampoo your hair.
customer_reviews.author: yvonnelin

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!!
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair feel so nasty and oily. It shouldn't even be called shampoo and shouldn't even have a one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and makes my hair so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of the shampoo and it makes my hair feel so soft and it kind of tames my frizz. I do have "fine" hair but it feels thicker when I use this and I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi PM

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is amazing! It works well on frizzy hair and flyaway ...
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing! It works well on frizzy hair and flyaway hair. I am impressed with how much shine it adds. It goes on easily and has a pleasant smell. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: erin gerrity

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff dries out my hair and tangles it so bad even if I use a little bit
customer_reviews.text: This stuff dries out my hair and tangles it so bad even if I use a little bit. It only gets two stars because it does cleanse your hair really well (unfortunately it also strips it) and smells great-
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stanislawski

product_meta.title: Garnier Whole Blends Shampoo with Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter Extracts, 12.5 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Our velvety smoothing shampoo for frizzy hair, blooms with an exotic fragrance of coconut oil & cocoa butter, bringing to life our wholesome care that nourishes hair and tames frizz & flyaways. When using the Garnier Whole Blends Smoothing system of shampoo & conditioner. • Smoothing shampoo tames and controls frizzy hair • Smoothing Formula with sustainably sourced South Pacific coconut oil and West African cocoa butter extracts • Enirched with a Natural Blend, Paraben-Free • Gentle for everyday use Massage into wet hair, lather and rinse thoroughly. Follow with our Smoothing conditioner. For extra care, discover our Smoothing leave-in treatments.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :1.52 x 3.47 x 7.68 inches; 14.18 Ounces
 * Date First Available :February 4, 2016
 * Manufacturer :L'Oreal - Hair Care
 * ASIN :B01BGFNKYU

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars72 ratings Our velvety smoothing shampoo for frizzy hair, blooms with an exotic fragrance of coconut oil & cocoa butter, bringing to life our wholesome care that nourishes hair and tames frizz & flyaways. When using the Garnier Whole Blends Smoothing system of shampoo & conditioner. • Smoothing shampoo tames and controls frizzy hair • Smoothing Formula with sustainably sourced South Pacific coconut oil and West African cocoa butter extracts • Enirched with a Natural Blend, Paraben-Free • Gentle for everyday use Massage into wet hair, lather and rinse thoroughly. Follow with our Smoothing conditioner. For extra care, discover our Smoothing leave-in treatments.
feature_bullets: Smoothing shampoo tames and controls frizzy hair
Smoothing formula with sustainably sourced south pacific coconut oil and west african cocoa butter extracts
Enirched with a natural blend, paraben-free
